predicate.note: Frames file for 'rusticate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, surprise surprise.

example.name: I have no idea what this means
example.text: ``It took Zhao Ziyang (former premier and party chief) 10 years to build a team of economists who understood how the Western economies work and now that team is part in exile, part being rusticated *trace* and part missing.''
